title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

1 point per explanation. Both a Latin word/phrase and a translation are required for each explanation. Minimal Latin bolded. Four possible answers: substitit (she stopped); erravitne via (she wandered from the path); lassa resedit (she sat down exhausted) ; misero...fatone erepta (snatched by a sad fate).
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

2 points maximum

1 point per explanation. Both a Latin word/phrase and a translation are required for each explanation. Minimal Latin bolded. Four possible answers: substitit (she stopped); erravitne via (she wandered from the path); lassa resedit (she sat down exhausted) ; misero...fatone erepta (snatched by a sad fate).

Student response earns one of the available points.

2 points maximum

1 point per explanation. Both a Latin word/phrase and a translation are required for each explanation. Minimal Latin bolded. Four possible answers: substitit (she stopped); erravitne via (she wandered from the path); lassa resedit (she sat down exhausted) ; misero...fatone erepta (snatched by a sad fate).

Student response earns two of the available points.
